commit.message:
io.h (struct stream): Rename truncate to trunc.

        * io/io.h (struct stream): Rename truncate to trunc.
        (struncate): Same.
        * io/unix.c (raw_init): Rename truncate to trunc.
        (buf_init): Same.
        (open_internal): Same.

From-SVN: r145608

files.patch:

+	* io/io.h (struct stream): Rename truncate to trunc.
+	(struncate): Same.
+	* io/unix.c (raw_init): Rename truncate to trunc.
+	(buf_init): Same.
+	(open_internal): Same.
